title: Juan Cuadrado's mum revealed she 'prayed' for her son to leave Chelsea
text:

Juan Cuadrado's mother has revealed she sought divine intervention to allow the Colombian star to leave Chelsea in the summer. 
Antonio Conte saw Cuadrado score a stunning winner against Inter Milan on Sunday night. 
But Chelsea's £23m signing was desperate to extend his loan spell at the Italian champions after an unhappy half season at Stamford Bridge in 2015. 
His mother Marcelo Cuadrado told Gazzetta dello Sport: “He kept smiling at Chelsea but I could see he was not right. “It was a difficult period for him, the toughest of his career. The Colombian striker scored a spectacular winner against Inter (Photo: REUTERS) Cuadrado is still on the Blues' books (Photo: Darren Walsh) 
"This summer I was praying every day that he’d go back to Juve.I knew he’d get back to being the same as always in Turin. After the game against Inter, I just hugged him and said: ‘You were great’.” 
Cuadrado rejoined Juventus on a three-year loan deal on deadline day in August with an option to buy out his contract each season. poll loading Is Juan Cuadrado Chelsea's biggest flop signing? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
